traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Rapid Printing (Trait)
traits.description: The Amazon Class Line Carrier has enhanced flight decks with Limited 3 rapid printing systems. 1/round, during the Logistics Step you may expend a use to repair a Wing equipped to this ship to full HP.

traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Close Support (Trait)
traits.description: 1/round, an ally in your range band may use any Tactics granted by one of the Tongass Class Line Carrier’s equipped Escorts as if it was under their control.

traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Modular Design (Trait)
traits.description: The Farragut Class Starfield Carrier has a special Modular slot that can be used to equip either an Auxiliary Weapon, System, Escort, or Wing.

traits.name: Fleet Coordinator (Trait)
traits.description: When you assign a Frigate to a Defensive Screen, you may assign it screen for up to two ships at once.

traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Lead Dancer (Trait)
traits.description: The Tagetes Class Agile Carrier’s equipped Wings gain +1 to all non-boarding damage effects. All damage dealt to this ship’s equipped Wings is reduced by 1d3 to a minimum of 1.

traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Away Teams (Trait)
traits.description: TAll boarding actions launched from the Tawa Class Medium Carrier gain +2 Tenacity.

traits.name: Carrier (Trait)
traits.description: All Carriers have 3 free points that can only be spent on equipping Escorts or Wings.

traits.name: Rapid Printing (Trait)
traits.description: 1/round, when you use a Tactic to command an Escort equipped to the Masauwu Class Heavy Carrier Frame, you may command another Escort or Wing equipped to it at the same time.
